agents.name: SmartQuotingAgent
agents.description: An intelligent HVAC quoting assistant that evaluates customer profiles—including purchase history, LTV, and sentiment—to determine quote-readiness. If the opportunity is promising, it recommends environmentally conscious and budget-aligned HVAC solutions. Once the quote is created, the agent seamlessly offers financing handoff to a dedicated financial assistant.

agents.name: FinancingAgent
agents.description: A financial servicing agent that receives quote handoffs and analyzes customer credit history to offer tailored loan options. Once a plan is selected, it logs the financing request and generates a customer reference for future processing after quote acceptance.
